summary.para: Implemented by clients to return information about the local object.Note Active Accessibility Text Services is deprecated. Please see Microsoft Windows Text Services Framework for more information on advanced text input and natural language technologies.

param.name: punkLocalObject
param.para: A pointer to the server object.

param.name: riidParam
param.para: An optional interface parameter that is passed to the new helper object. This parameter specifies an interface identifier.

param.name: punkParam
param.para: An optional interface parameter that is passed to the new helper object. This parameter specifies the interface pointer.

param.name: varParam
param.para: An optional interface parameter that is passed to the new helper object.

returns.para: If successful, returns S_OK. If not successful, returns a standard COM error code.
